content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my back deck smoking a cigarette around 9:20 pm. i looked to the northern sky and had seen two planes flying side by side staggered going west to east. they were really far up and i can't tell you how far they were. but with my frame of reference holding my fingers up in the air and looking at them they were about a quarter of an inch apart. i have no idea actually how many miles that could even calculate to. i thought to myself that those planes seem to look close together. the plane that was furthest north was ahead of the other using my frame of reference with my fingers again about a half of an inch. i then realized that there was a black pill shape object following behind them. what i thought was strange was both planes had con trails but the pill shape had no trail. the planes were both the silver/white color but the third object was so dark. all three objects were flying west to east. i live in branch county mi. i see many  planes flying over my area every day and night. i am pretty sure they are coming/going from the detroit and chicago airports. we also have the small kalamazoo airport about 45 minutes n/w from my home. but these planes were in my opinion were way too high to have just left the kalamazoo airport. the plane furthest north was ahead of the other plane. i noticed the black object following behind them was larger than both of the planes. i then watched the black pill shape object gain speed catching up to the plane that was furthest ahead. it was with my frame of reference using my fingers about an inch and a half behind the plane that was ahead. in about 10-20 seconds it was catching up and passing the slowest plane it appeared to be going in between the air spaces of the two planes. everything i was watching was approaching a huge 100 yr old maple tree that was obstructing my view. i stood on the deck waiting for them to pass the tree line so that i could continue following them but they never reappeared. in my opinion of what i viewed the plane that was going slower and was the furthest behind possibly could have seen this black pill shape object. 
the only reason i took notice was i thought the two planes seemed close together and then i noticed the black object following that had no con trail. the entire elapsed time i witnessed this event was about 30 seconds. 
this may have nothing to do with what i witnessed but i called one of my close friends about 9:30 pm to tell her about this and there was no answer so i left her a message to what i had just seen. i then called my other close friend and my home phone started really bad static while i was dialing her. there was a lot of static and interference that i have not encountered like that before. i asked her if she could hear it but it was not as bad on her end as it was on mine. i then went to switch my cordless phone to another one. the other phone that i picked up could not find signal, i assumed the other phone i picked up would work so i had already hung up the bad connection phone. in turn i ended up hanging up on my friend. she then had to call me back. who knows this may have been purely coincidence with the bad phone line connection and have nothing to do with this. any way to make a really, really long story short i am not sure what i witnessed i am not crazy just a normal wife and mom.
content.summary: Two planes were flying staggered and a black pill shape was following them with no con trail and gained speed catching up to the furthest plane and they then disappeared behind the trees.

content.detailedDescription: A large bright object appeared suddenly to the west, and suddenly disappeared.   it hovered for a few seconds.
content.summary: Large bright object appeared suddenly to the west, hovered, and suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I and two friends were in panama city beach for a weekend.  we drove to the south and east end of panama city (of 1970)to the dunes there. we got our sleeping bags out and cooler and built a small campfire down between several
tall dunes where we couldn't be seen.  we had something to eat and then layed down on our backs looking at the stars directly above (i mean straight up).

we were talking about various things, but were staring up all the time when all of a sudden one of the stars (or what we thought were stars) moved in a zig zag pattern and abruptly stopped and looked like a star again. the other one zig zagged eastward and disappeared toward the horizon. the speed and 90 degree turns were unreal. nothing moves like that 

in light of the fact that i didn't believe in ufos at that time, these things i saw with my own eyes convinced me they were here. this was the most amazing thing i've ever seen. i remember thinking then how close we were from pensicloa naval air station, and they were probably watching that. i also remember thinking that's the best way to hide from space..."they just look like stars".  

we all jumped up when we saw this and were so excited about what we just saw.
later, i remember feeling very uneasy and even a little frightened about the
posibilty they might come down and hover over us.  i had a hard time going to sleep that night.
content.summary: Camping, looking up at stars. one star zig zaged to horizon, one zig zagged and stopped.

content.detailedDescription: Was having coffee on back deck about 9:30 am. my wife thinks she sees a bird (eagle hawk) way up. i can't see it at first, she points to a top branch of a maple and says it has gone behind it and will come out the other side in a second. i see it immediately. it looks like a cloud very small, it is a stretched oval shape, looks 1 inch long and 1/4 inch high. it is moving very fast, there is no trail just this white oval moving very fast, after a couple of seconds i ran inside a grabbed the binoculars. i was able to focus on the object quickly (i was surprised i know from experience how hard it is to train in on such a small object from experience with birds). i was able to view the object for 5 to 10 second before it went behind the other trees. through the binoculars it was actually split in half horizontally. the halfs were flat in the centre and curved on the other side, like two saucer shapes one above the other the top one upside down. it was not a clearly defined line but fuzzy (cloud like}. it went behind the trees and was gone. my wife ran around the other side of the house but did not see it. i use binoculars a lot and can see the jets clearly through them. we have small airport locally with a parachute club and cfb greenwood close by and are very familiar with all kinds of aircraft. you name it we have probable seen it. if i had not seen it through binoculars i would probably have dismissed it.
content.summary: Small(bird size)oval cloud to naked eye, trough binoculars was split horizontally, faster than any jet

content.detailedDescription: I saw 5 orange fire balls cross the sky in a well populated area. they moved about the speed and height of a slower moving helicopter i often see i've the city. they rose from the wnw and moved out if sight of my building around wsw. there was no noise i could here over the hum of the hwy and the odd motorcycle that by one street over.  shortly after the first 5 were out of sight another 2 appeared and followed the same path. they were probably about 30 secs appart though my sense of time dissapeared due to the shock of what i was seeing.
content.summary: 5 orange lights appeared fairly close together then shortly after 2 appeared about 1min intervals. made no noise and was slow

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was parking truck at a nearby club.

2. i noticed the object from its brilliant orange color, it was bright and getting brighter, then it went less brighter and then brighter again. its just struck me funny, i then noticed another traveling the same path, it caught up to the other one and both traveled equal distance from each other both ended up disappearing after getting to a certain point in the sky. kind of disappeared when directly over head. 

3. i have seen other ufo's throughout my life, so when i first saw them i thought maybe planes traveling from the horizon with their headlights dead on, but they were orange and flickering, rather than blinking or pulsating. 2nd thing i thought of was the ufo's that have been being seen globally (i read mufon often, the top 20 sightings) and i relayed that information to the witness (yes, i had a witness) and even described that they travel in pairs or threes and in straight line, in which these did. yes, after these disappeared, there were more traveling toward where the others disappeared. orange flame like color. no noise, but then the nearby club was playing music.

4. the objects were flame like orange in appearance, started out with 2 traveling together and disappearing high above. then more commenced, probably approx 8-9 objects total. flickering, or getting brighter at some points of their flight, but constant in their color until they disappeared. (or appeared to disappear)

5. i was excited that it was a sighting of what others been reporting.

6. i lost sight of objects when they appeared to disappear, directly over head above the coast line of providence river/ harbor. above where the club was.
content.summary: 8-9 fireballs travelling over providence river/ harbor toward/ in east providence

content.detailedDescription: On thursday night at 11 pm my wife and i went out to the front yard to sit and enoy the night air,as we sat there for about 10 mnutes i  saw a comerricial jet airliner coming from the western sky heading easst bound and was just wondering where it was going ,as i wtched it go from west to the eastmy eye caught an object in the eastern sky that was very large. i told my nwife to look and see what i was seing so she turned in her chair and gaspt at the size of it. we contuned to watch the object going from east to west ,i ran just inside my house and got my field glasses so i could get a better view.In a matter of seconds i was back in the front yard looking at this object and this nis what i saw. aobject about 300 ft or more in length traveling west bound about 1500 ft in heighth and moving at about the same speed of a small engined aircraft but making not even a sound , my wife also commited on the lack of sound, so we looked at this object as it moved directly in front of us and all we could see was a row of red lights going from front to back in a straight line. once this object got to the western side of us it slowly slid not turned to a more n,western angle from where we were standing and then we saw the red lights on the bacvk which were the same as what we saw on the sides. this object looked like a triangle in form with the main body being very long and the back of it being i would estimate at about 1/3 of the length. we stood there for a good 10 minutes until it was below our line of sight and we could not see it anymore.
content.summary: Object was sighted in eastern sky and watched as it slowly flew to the western sky where it turned north

content.detailedDescription: I work as a defense contractor for the us navy at naval station mayport jacksonville , fl. on the winter night of feb. 16th i was working as the 2nd shift supervisor for my dept. and had left the ship my personnel were working on and was transiting to another vessel. while waiting on the pier for the shuttle bus to arrive i was looking at the stars in the sky towards the west. it was a extremely cold clear night with no moon that i can recall. from the west towards the city of jacksonville i witnessed a light at a high altitude moving towards the east at a high rate of speed as i watched i tried to pick out any blinking lights thinking it may be a plane.   my first thought was that the pilot was entering air space restricted to civil aviation it being a military base. after i realized that there were no navigation lights blinking and that the rate of speed far exceeded aircraft that i knew of i continued to view the object. it had traveled to about to 75 to 80 degrees above me when it blinked out completely. there were absolutely no clouds at all that night and i never saw the object again.
content.summary: Witnessed object moving fast west to east at extreme altitude, than disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch at approximately 9 pm  there are a thicket of trees to my right.  i was looking to my right when i saw a medium grayish brown elongated object, at least 300 feet long, drift by just below the tree line.  it took 3-5 minutes to drift by over several houses & then passed by.  it had a line of white & orange lights running along the side.  i have observed two other dissimilar objects at different times & dates with different descriptions.  i am right next door to bucks county.  when i first saw the object my jaw dropped & i just sat there motionless.  unfortunately,  i don't have a camera so i could not take a picture.
content.summary: I was sitting on my back porch around 9 pm & on my right just almost above a thicket of trees i saw this elongated grayish-brown object literally drift by without a sound or a trail of vapor.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in back yard with girlfriend. it was a very clear night, no clouds and just a few stars... then i noticed something moving in the sky eastbound, very high... i stared at it for a few seconds. it was nothing i recognized so i pointed it out to my girlfriend to make sure i wasn't seeing things and she confirmed exactly what i saw without me asking. a boomerang object very high, no lights, no trails, no sound, heading east very fast. it gave off a very weird dull glow and looked transparent. my gf described it perfectly when she said it looked like an ex-ray picture of a bone with the hazy white outlines. we watched it for about 20 seconds as it stayed a steady course and speed heading straight forward. i got up to run into the house to grab my binoculars... as i ran in the house, my gf still observing the object, the object turned ne and upward at a much quicker speed and out of sight. 
my gf doesn't normally like to say she believes in ufo's but this was unmistakably and clearly a ufo boomerang object. it actually freaked her out and she said something very interesting... she said that as soon as i went into the house the object took off as if it knew we were watching and didn't want to been seen.
my best guess is that the object was extremely high (50,000ft or higher) and guessing very large, maybe 500/ 1000 feet wide. but from our stand point, if i held my arm out straight, the object looked about as big as an inch in wing span.
please feel free to call.
thanks,

paul.
content.summary: Boomerang shape soft white transparent looking no lights very large very high steady forward motion then took off upward out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I went out to check my game camera's to see what animals i had captured only to find this strange light anomaly. i'm not sure, exactly, what type light it is. as you can see, the light does not touch the ground or seem to reflect off the ground. i was hoping you could look at it and tell me what type light this is or have an expert look at it. i'm curious as to what could have caused it. i've never seen it again or captured it on my game camera's. i also captured on my game camera, some type entity. at least, that's what it looks like to me. i'd like a expert to look at it also and tell me what it could possibly be.
content.summary: Strange light beam caught on trail camera

content.detailedDescription: Am in las vegas for jewelry convention.  relaxing in pool watching the jets in the sky.  had been watching sky for 15 minutes only saw jumbo jets high in the air and ones leaving las vegas airport.  then i saw a star like object very bright.  it was not moving.  i talked to a couple from new jersey to see if they saw light.  they did then showed waitress at pool she also saw.  said it was a ufo.  showed two guys from scotland they also saw.  the couple saw another light in the sky.  this one was brighter than the first and would flash or pulse very brightly then dim some.  second one started slowly moving.  went behind aria hotel.  we started watching second orb.  some wispy clouds came in view.  looked like it started to move and pulse .   it then just vanished.  mostly clear sky.  very high wispy clouds.  we witnessed high flying jets at the same time.  these lights were stationary for a few minutes before they moved.  lasted around five minutes.  did not see any more.  very high in the sky and very bright.  looked like over airport area.
content.summary: Pulsing bright light high in sky stationary then moved

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back of the house and noticed an orb then multiple orbs moving horizontally and vertically. i was unsure ar first, but once observing them and their movements i knew they were ufos. i was at first amazed then a little scared due to its close proximity to me. they finally just disappeared and 2 orbs returned about. 1 hour later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One then multiple. orbs above house

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back of the house and noticed an orb then multiple orbs moving horizontally and vertically. i was unsure ar first, but once observing them and their movements i knew they were ufos. i was at first amazed then a little scared due to its close proximity to me. they finally just disappeared and 2 orbs returned about. 1 hour later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One then multiple. orbs above house

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from a long trip back from nj and wanted to use the new binoculars i had obtained from my father. i find that using binoculars is the best way to view the night sky because you get dynamic movement and get a better field of view than with a telescope. i walked out my back door unto my deck and adjusted the binoculars with the brightest object visible at the time which was saturn about 20 degrees over the tree line. as i looked at saturn i noticed just below it what appeared to be a constellation of stars with about 6-8 stars in it. they were dim, like the stars that are much further away  but the entire field of view seemed to match perfectly as far as color, shading, contrast, brightness. in other words nothing looked odd except that these stars caught my attention. i focused mentally primarily on the four left most stars in this particular "constellation" then what seemed like a second or two later this "constellation" moved. all 6-8 points moved in unison against the night sky which i noted was stationary. i could see the other objects in the sky not moving except for this "constellation". the best way i could describe it was like i was using a photoshop picture of the night sky then used a lasso tool and selected this constellation then copied and pasted it over the picture of the night sky and i could drag that small layer anywhere on the picture of the stars behind it. it moved upward, what seemed to be about 10-20 degrees in elevation then stopped and moved down about 5 degrees then i lost sight of it. there were clouds in the sky and bluish heat lightning which i observed. while tis was happening i called out to my wife twice to bring me parer and a pen so i could draw what i was seeing. i was looking through the binoculars and didn't want to lose sight of it or had them to her to see so i could still track it. i felt physically shaken and slightly nauseous probably from witnessing what had just happened. the "cutout" had a similar shape an airplane in that it was larger and thicker horizontally than vertically but had a protrusion below it sort of like a wing or a minute hand on a clock pointing at about 4 or 5 o'clock.  i've included a picture of what i saw. i use an app on my phone called "sky chart" to show what i was looking at and where the object was. the red dashes in the picture where not visible but are an aid to show the approximate shape of what i was. it could have been any size but my impression was it was the size of a small city. the white dots in the red dashed represent the "stars" i saw that moved in unison.
content.summary: Cloaked ufo looked like photoshopped image moving in my field of view through binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
This last week at work has been a good one for photographing ufos. i've recorded tangible craft, transparent orbs, white orbs, and crab eyes ufos.

crab eyes is a term i use to describe a common invisible ufo craft, where one can only see two lights in the sky that seem to move in tandem. most often, these two lights are oriented at a 30 degree angle or greater to horizontal. when these craft are ready to exit, they tend to just disappear from sight, much like a crab scurrying off into murky water, beyond our field of vision.

all the photos included here were taken during my lunch hour, from 11:30 to 12:30 arizona time, during the last half of may. the photos themselves are time stamped, providing for a more precise annotation with each one.

in the last photo i'm including here (file 5) you will see a bird right in the center of the photo. take a closer look at what's just above the bird in the background, to the left and to the right. you will have to zoom in to see all there is to see with this one.
content.summary: This report involves multiple sightings during the last half of may, 2014.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from work on the evening of the 29th of may at around 9:45 p.M.
i drove up the hill, and park the car in the driveway. 

got out of the car and opened the passenger side door to grab my belongings.
with the car door still open, i stood there and look up.
not really seeing much out of the ordinary...Some clouds, stars, and planets.

i stood a little longer. 

a laser thin, lightning fast, yellowish -orangish white line of light appeared in the sky, as i faced the south. it did not streak across the sky, but was fully formed, from east to west.

it looked like a door to a fully lit room had been cracked open, so that just a thin line of light had been allowed to escape.

just as quickly as it had appeared, the light vanished. total time: less than 5 seconds.
i stood there a few more minutes, but saw nothing else extraordinary in the sky.
content.summary: A laser thin, lightning fast, yellowish - white horizontal line of light appeared in the sky, as i faced the south. it did not streak across the sky, like a meteor, or comet. like a door cracking open, emitting light, from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I was working in a celebrity gifting suite at a local radio stations concert. i had left the suite to go grab lunch in an open quad with food vendors. while i was walking to find something for lunch, i looked up and saw 2 glowing orbs floating and moving side to side. when i initially observed the objects i already knew they were not terrestrial aircraft. the way they maneuvered were uncommon of human airplanes or helicopters. at first i noticed 2 orbs, then at a closer glance i noticed 3 orbs in a triangular pattern. after about 5 minutes i noticed an additional 3 orbs floating off the top orb in the formation.  basically it was a very large triangular shape made up of 3 orbs, then the top of the triangle turned into another small triangle. i ended up losing sight of the object because i had to walk far away to another area. i felt very strongly that these were ufo's given that i have observed ufo's in the past.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observed multiple orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Please see my facebook page.  he has no idea i am sending you this message.
content.summary: One of my friends has a great video capture

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving home between 10:30 and 11:00 pm.  i stopped at a light and noticed a bright red light out of the corner of my eye.  i wondered if it was a cell phone tower or some kind of tower. i've driven this route many times at night and never noticed this light before. as i started driving i noticed that the red light was actually a large object hovering in the sky. at first i thought it must be a plane or helicopter because it had red and green lights that seemed to be in the shape of a cross, which i thought was strange. it was quite large and i'd never seen a plane or helicopter that size, or one that showed both red and green lights at the same time. then it moved across the sky.  i followed it with my eyes and saw a second one. it too moved across the sky and then stayed still and hovered. (i'm driving the whole time). i watched them for about 15 minutes, then i phoned home and told my husband to look out the window (we live on hill).  i heard him say, "yes, green and red lights." so he saw it too. by the time i got home they were gone. i lost sight of the objects because i was no longer on a hill. once i drove to the bottom, the objects were lost in the skyline that was crowded with trees and buildings. the impression i had was that the two objects were working together and they seemed to be observing or looking for something.  my husband who went outside, and had the patio door open said he didn't hear any sound from the object (he only saw one). he tried to take a picture but it didn't work. i'm sure this sounds very strange, but the shape of these objects reminded me of the starship enterprise.

i'd really like to know what these are?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects moving back and forth in sky then hovered for extended period of time. no sound. very bright red and green lights in the shape of a cross.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed 3 unknown disc in sky over los alamitos california. one was just hovering, the other was ascending, and the other was streaking upward at a high rate of speed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed 3 unknown disc in sky...

content.detailedDescription: In valley,ne roasting marsh-mellows, i look at the sky and see a giant dull sphere that was red. it made a crescent. i was with my mother and brother too. later it faded away. we were thinking it was the moon, venus, or mars. but we knew it wasn't the moon cause the moon was somewhere else, and venus and mars can't be that close to us. later at lest two planes came, one went by where it faded away, and the other had a search-light close to the spot where it faded away.
content.summary: Sphere-like shape in the sky that was crest-like red.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out and was looking at the big dipper and i step back to get the higher power lens.. looked up and seen this white light - totally silent going between the big and little dipper. 

i watched it until it stopped dead right where polaris is and bam gone.. not a single sound or blinking lights like planes have. i'm hoping it was just a satellite. 

what really freaked me out.. after standing back and waiting to see this light move again i see this bright yellow light (going n - nw) fly across the sky headed towards the next town- disappeared - then reappeared behind the trees.
content.summary: Super high object then bright ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was in the back yard when she saw the object at about 8:30pm. she called to me when i was inside our house and i went outside to see what she was calling me for. she pointed up to the sky and i saw what resembled a meteor or some object entering the atmosphere from space. however, it did not leave a trail like those objects and didn't seem to be moving as fast as i would imagine those objects to move (how they may vary in speed i do not know). it did appear to be aflame, which is why i initially thought of something entering the atmosphere from space. the color was bright orange/red like a flame. to me it was also reminiscent of the brightness and color of the exhaust of rockets i have seen launched from kennedy space center. it moved smoothly and quietly across the sky from north east to north west. i watched it for about 5 to 10 seconds from the back (under a screened patio) and quickly ran through the house to the front (the direction of travel of the object) so i could get a better look. i removed my cell phone camera from my pocket on the way to the front yard and managed to get a blurry picture of the glowing object before switching my cell phone camera to video mode. i recorded video of it for 52 seconds. the light appeared to extinguish about 20 seconds from the end of my video. for the remainder of the time it appeared dark, like a silhouette against the darkening blue sky.

we live somewhat close to boca raton airport which serves small jets and we are in their approach path. corporate/private jets fly over our house regularly and they can be loud enough to compete with our conversations on the back patio. the object in question here made no noise and traveled opposite to the direction we typically see of airport traffic. we are west and slightly south of the airport. planes fly east over our house to land. i suppose they might take off toward our house too, but i haven't paid attention or noticed if they depart the airport and fly over us. i only recall flights heading in for landing.

the video i uploaded is 42 seconds. i trimmed 10 seconds from the beginning because i had originally oriented my phone camera vertically and decided a few seconds into the recording that i would do the rest horizontally. additionally, there are a lot of trees obstructing the view as i come out of my house into the front yard, so there are only a couple of second in which the object is visible before i turn my phone horizontally. toward the end of the video the object goes dark but can still be seen moving across the sky. i lost track of it in a couple of spots on the video because i was mostly using my eyes to watch while  periodically glancing at the camera. apologies for the shaky video. also note, i used the digital zoom feature of my camera phone (4x, i believe).
content.summary: Resembled a fireball, meteor or rocket entering the atmoshphere, but seemed slower than i imagine these to be.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south bound on interstate 270 i was the passenger. i looked out my window and noticed what seemed to be at least 20 very bright orange lights. at first i thought maybe hot air balloons but then i looked at radio and realised it was 9:15pm and thought those aren't air balloons. i told my wife to look and while she was driving she also witnessed the sighting. as we were doing 60 mph i couldn't take a picture. we lost site of them be hind some trees but from what i could tell they were still there. oh and there were about 5 or 6 of them in a single row, the others were above and below them and 1 seemed to move faster then the rest. not quite sure what it was we saw but i'm almost sure it wasn't planes, hot air balloons it anything else but my first sighting of ufo's.
content.summary: Brought orange lights appeared to be oval in shape.

content.detailedDescription: Omg. this gas to be many miles in size. i have seen this same thing 6 months  ago but that time it had a revolving much smaller ship/ craft moving around it circling the larger much much larger mothership as like it was on patrol... this is the most beautiful peice of work ever.  as i  write this is still can see it. this is defiantly not a star,satellite  no way no way no how  i am observing this wirh a busgbell x 40 =i cab see it clearly the sky  is clear   awesome!!!
content.summary: Gigantic. must be many miles. it is blinking with very deep ambor colors like the rainbow. it has to be many many miles awat maybe over 20 at least over mc dill airforce base if i were to guess it gas to be majorly huge !

content.detailedDescription: This is some thing that i failed to see the first time i looked at it/ but if any one can tell me that we have a air craft that can do a 360 and creep to a place they feal like that they can hide tell me.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving south on highway 5 in coalinga, ca. driving to phoenix from northern california.
2. i saw what i thought was a plane, it flew straight up and over us, it went up quick in a field and then flew right over us, slowly.
3. i first thought it was a plane, but it didn't look like any plane i have ever seen, it had 3 huge white lights on the underside.
4. it took off straight towards us i thought why would a plane fly so low, when i saw the underside with the huge white round lights, it was dark in color with sharp edges, triangle shaped with no other lights. it flew above us maybe 20 ft. it flew to the west of the highway and all the lights underneath came on brighter when the light came on brighter, it rotated in the air before its decent , then landing in a field. i pulled over and there was a huge glowing light. 
5. i was in disbelief and totally amazed, i was very glad to have a witness with me who saw the same. it was truly unbelievable. i started to google what it could possibly be, but couldn't find anything to explain.
6. it landed in a field with a fence around it, we went to a rest stop a mile away and watched the glowing light. there was no way to see since it was far into the field.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ascended on 1 side of the expressway hovered over us then descended on the other side in an orchard a few, miles away from us

content.detailedDescription: My then husband and i were just doing our norm for the time of day. i don't remember where my son was, but he wasn't home.  i remember just walking through the house, the door was ajar and from my side view i could see a hue of gold or orange like color outside, the entire area sky and all had changed! i went to the door expecting to see some sort of storm brewing to see........ an orb!! my husband happened to look out the bedroom window at the same time as we both noticed not just this one going slowly up the street headed north on mersington ave, but also one going up east on 35th street! okay what happened next..... we both commenced to closing the door and blinds, peeked liked scared little children out the blinds and i remember him going into the bedroom, i sat on the livingroom floor and the next thing i remember was waking up. we both woke up around the same time. i remember we both looked to see if they were gone and that was the end of that! no pictures, no calling of anyone, nothing! this wouldn't be the last i'd see them either! i lived at 7201 olive st kcmo 64132 around same to of year, i'm not sure but i do remember my son was at school and my thought was, not again! i again closed my blinds, sat on the floor and next thing i remembered was waking up! i had no knowledge of what happened until a couple of years ago. after watching one of the ancient aliens episodes i started getting memories of something happened to me! i've searched the web for something anything to clarify i'm not crazy. i have a spot of ski on my outer right let that won't go away, it looks and feels like rough skin but nothing else. i found  another spot on my left leg! has any one reported anything like these in the area, anywhere around these time frames? please help!
content.summary: Broad daylight sighting  of a gold orb like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted at exactly 23.03 may 31st 2014 and was visable for 22 seconds.

intense pink and red glowing diamond shape approx 30ft diameter desended from cloud cover and travelled from west to east direction and changed to south direction were it passed over houses and railway and out of sight. 

the object did not make any noticable sound but was like nothing i've ever seen. the glowing intense lights were constant, very slight variation in intensity but was constant.
content.summary: Glowing  pink/red object desended from cloud cover may 31st  2014
